definitions: an American warbler, the male of which is black with either a red belly or orange markings.

notes.text: Genera Setophaga and Myioborus, subfamily Parulinae, family Emberizidae: several species, in particular the American redstart (S. ruticilla)

shortDefinitions: American warbler, male of which is black with either red belly or orange markings

definitions: a Eurasian and North African songbird related to the chats, having a reddish tail and underparts.

notes.text: Phoenicurus and other genera, subfamily Turdinae, family Muscicapidae: several species, in particular the widespread P. phoenicurus

shortDefinitions: Eurasian and North African songbird related to chats, having reddish tail and underparts
